NewsArticle.Title: The Merriest of Dreams
NewsArticle.Content: Tired and weary from a long day? Come take a nice nap at the inns of Mileth, Rucesion, and Noam. And may your dreams be merry. ((This is a Christmas event that takes place outside the world of Dark Ages. The event will begin on Dec. 21 and end on Dec. 27. New items have been added to the gifts from the Christmas Tree. Merry Christmas and Happy Holidays, DA Team))
